title: 218: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 3 (Chris Harrison Writes Erotica & New Villains?!)
itunes:title: 218: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 3 (Chris Harrison Writes Erotica & New Villains?!)
description:
The Broads chat about Matt James’ 3rd episode as Bachelor and WOW what a ride. They chat about fainting Sarah, Chris Harrison’s book (?!?!) and the erotica date that follows, their passionate love for Katie, Queen Victoria being Queen Victoria, Sarah’s new found position on the show, Matt James’ love for turtles, group confrontations, theories about Sarah returning, and much more!


***Join The Broads Thursday for an episode covering all the recent Bach Nation news/drama!
